Malice:
 
The minion stabbed Malice in the chest with an energon blade.  It hurt alot, and so Malice punched Night Strike in the face a few times, the stabbed him in the chest with his katanna.  He took a step back and looked at his chest.  He smirked, and absorbed the energon out of the knife, dropped it to the ground, and focused on healing the wound.  Thanks to the Transmetal 2 body, it heal quickly and then Malice approached Night strike, this time with both his katanna and the Verte- Breaker sword.
"Is that all you got?  Some servant of Unicron!"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Nightstrike::

"Yess" hissed the male and with energon's knife tried to stabb  
MAlice

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> The bounty hunter takes the hit head on.  Where others would wish 
to recover, Malice used the momentuum to put the minion in a 
headlock.  He pulled the minion around until he lost his footing and 
fell, his head stuck in Malice's headlock.  The bounty hunter drew 
his smaller titanium katanna and pressed the tip to a seam on the 
minion's neck.
> "Are we having fun yet?" he said as he continued his demonic grin.
